attr.title: Dungeon Souls
attr.desc: Dungeon Souls is an action-adventure roguelike dungeon crawler which draws heavy inspiration from Nuclear Throne, Risk of Rain, and Overture. Explore vast procedurally generated dungeons, collect loot, and slay hordes of challenging enemies!
attr.inst: Download the game from Steam. Please note: files from Humble and GOG may not work at this time. Rename DungeonSouls.exe to DungeonSouls.zip, extract. Copy data.win and all .ogg files to /ports/dungeonsouls/gamedata. If controls are incorrectly mapped, from the title screen select options, enable gamepad, then select back and quit from the main menu. Controls should be good to go on subsequent launches.
